title: Vampire Hunter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Visit a player every night to see if they're a vampire

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you visit a member of the vampire faction, you will kill them.
- You can passively read the vampire factional chat
- Once all vampires are killed, you will become a random non-jailor night visiting town killing (if they have a limited amount of shots, you will only have one)
- This role will spawn with the Vampires faction.

desc:
Post 5256
*"YOU DON'T BELONG IN THIS WORLD, MONSTER!"*
